revised_title: Renin Induced Proteinuria and Adrenalectomy: Haemodynamic Changes and Function
tldr: The study investigates the relationship between renin-induced proteinuria and the effects of adrenalectomy on haemodynamic changes in rats. The results show that adrenalectomy impairs renal function and prevents renin-induced proteinuria. Corticosterone administration restores normal renal function and proteinuric response in some cases.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Physiology and Pathophysiology
